mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department(name, parentKey, depth, remark, useYn, createDate, createId) VALUES (#{name}, #{parentKey}, #{depth}, #{remark}, #{useYn}, #{createDate}, #{createId})
mapper.select: SELECT c1.departmentKey, c1.name, c1.parentKey, c2.name AS parentName, c1.depth, c1.remark, c1.useYn, c1.createDate, date_format(c1.createDate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS createDateFormat FROM department AS c1 LEFT JOIN department AS c2 ON c1.parentKey = c2.departmentKey WHERE c1.departmentKey = #{departmentKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE department SET name = #{name}, remark = #{remark}, useYn = #{useYn}, updateDate = #{updateDate}, updateId = #{updateId} WHERE departmentKey = #{departmentKey}
UPDATE department SET useYn = "N" WHERE departmentKey = #{departmentKey}
